it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.linkingrules

Class ConnectionBeam<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.linkingrules.EuclideanDistance<T>
      • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.linkingrules.ConnectionBeam<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILinkingRule<T>, Serializable

    public class ConnectionBeam<T>
extends EuclideanDistance<T>
    Connects two nodes if, throwing a beam from one to the other, there exists at least one path entirely inside the beam that connects the two nodes. This rule is ideal for environments with obstacles, where the user wants some tolerance in connection breaking.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
